name: SOMER Blink [Chrome - Stylish]
description: This script will simplify the SOMER.blink (EVE Online Lotteries) to make it easier to find and enter draws. It also makes it thinner so you can leave it open without cluttering your desktop.
additional_info: I am aware this script is currently not working correctly with Firefox on desktop and mobile. I plan to tackle this soon :)

discussions.name: Firefox for Android (Script not working correctly)
